mapper.select: SELECT employee_no, employee_name, hire_Date, employee_resp, department_name, rank_name FROM employees WHERE employee_no=#{employeeno}

SELECT employee_no, employee_name, hire_Date, employee_resp, department_name, e.rank_name, rank_ranking, e.company_code FROM employees e JOIN RANK r ON e.rank_name=r.rank_name AND e.company_code=r.company_code WHERE e.company_code = #{companycode} AND rank_ranking>( select rank_ranking from RANK WHERE rank_name = #{rankname} AND company_code = #{companycode}) AND resign_date IS NULL ORDER BY rank_ranking

SELECT TO_CHAR(start_time,'HH24:MI') AS start_time, NVL(TO_CHAR(end_time,'HH24:MI'),' ') AS end_time, state, TO_CHAR(att_date,'dd') AS att_date, half_off FROM attendance WHERE employee_no = #{employeeno} AND att_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+ 1

SELECT att_date, TO_CHAR(start_time,'HH24:MI') AS start_time, TO_CHAR(end_time,'HH24:MI') AS end_time, state FROM attendance WHERE employee_no = #{employeeno} AND att_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+ 1 ORDER BY att_date

SELECT att_date, case when trunc(((end_time- start_time)*24*60)/60)=0 then to_char(trunc(MOD((end_time- start_time)*24*60,60)))||'분' else to_char(trunc(((end_time- start_time)*24*60)/60)||'시간') ||to_char(abs(trunc(MOD((end_time- start_time)*24*60,60))))||'분' END as "worktime_hour", trunc((end_time- start_time)*24*60) as "worktime_minute" , '9시간' as "standard_worktime_hour", 540 as "standard_worktime_minute", case when trunc(((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540)/60)=0 then to_char(trunc(MOD((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540,60)))||'분' else to_char(trunc(((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540)/60)||'시간') ||to_char(abs(trunc(MOD((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540,60))))||'분' END as "interval_hour" , trunc((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540) as "interval_minute" FROM attendance WHERE employee_no = #{employeeno} AND att_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+ 1 AND state IN ('정상출근','지각') ORDER BY att_date

SELECT case when trunc(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60)/60)=0 then to_char(trunc(MOD(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60),60)))||'분' else to_char(trunc(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60)/60)||'시간') ||to_char(abs(trunc(MOD(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60),60))))||'분' END as "sum_worktime_hour", trunc(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60)) as "sum_worktime_minute" ,case when trunc(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540)/60)=0 then to_char(trunc(MOD(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540),60)))||'분' else to_char(trunc(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540)/60)||'시간') ||to_char(abs(trunc(MOD(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540),60))))||'분' END as "sum_interval_hour", trunc(sum((end_time- start_time)*24*60-540)) as "sum_interval_minute" FROM attendance WHERE employee_no = #{employeeno} AND att_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+ 1 AND state IN ('정상출근','지각') ORDER BY att_date

SELECT TO_CHAR(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as vacationdate, CASE WHEN hol_type = '반차(오전)' OR hol_type = '반차(오후)' THEN 0.5 ELSE (TO_DATE(TRUNC(end_date), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(TRUNC(start_date), 'YYYY-MM-DD')+2) END as usevacation, h.start_date,d.create_date,hol_type,d.doc_status FROM document d JOIN hol_doc h ON d.doc_no=h.doc_no WHERE d.employee_no = #{employeeno} AND d.create_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+ 1 ORDER BY d.create_date
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET end_time = #{boardTitle} WHERE end_time = null
